thag5.5:1.1: Actually, it turned out to be a good thing,
thag5.5:1.2: how my mother spurred me on.
thag5.5:2.2: master of the three knowledges, seer of the deathless.
thag5.5:2.3: I’ve conquered the army of Namuci,
thag5.5:3.1: Those defilements that were found in me,
thag5.5:3.3: are all cut off without remainder,
thag5.5:5.2: this bag of bones is my last
thag5.5:5.3: in the transmigration through births and deaths;
thag5.5:5.4: now there are no more future lives.
